quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us. – J.R.R. Tolkien
fact: Cranberries are sorted for ripeness by bouncing them; a fully ripened cranberry can be dribbled like a basketball.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Why do valley girls hang out in odd numbered groups? Because they can't even.
